author: sarowe
msg: SOLR-4123: Add per-script customizability to ICUTokenizerFactory via rule files in the ICU RuleBasedBreakIterator format.

author: chirino
msg: Implemented AMQP support for: Transactions, Durable Subscriptions, and Selectors.  Passes JORAM tests when run against trunk version of the AMQP JMS client.

author: chirino
msg: Make sure we unbind producers from consumers when the producers disconnect.
